column4: Hey, I downloaded the Enemy Territory Quake Wars Demo and when I try to run it, I get a "segmentation fault" - Why is this?
I Downloaded ETQW-demo-client-1.1-full.r5.x86.run and then I did a "chmod +x FILE.RUN"  followed by a "./FILE.RUN"

hve you considered the file may be borked ?
